dialog: Hello Medi, I just had heart surgery. What should I do now?
Congratulations on making it through surgery. You should follow your doctor's post-operative instructions carefully
What kind of lifestyle changes should I make?
Your doctor may recommend making changes to your diet, exercise routine, and medication regimen. You should also avoid smoking and excessive alcohol consumption
What kind of exercise can I do?
Your doctor will advise you on what types of exercise are safe for you to do. It's important to start slowly and gradually increase the intensity and duration of your workouts
Are there any foods I should avoid?
You should avoid foods high in saturated and trans fats, sodium, and added sugars. It's also important to limit your alcohol intake
